name: Bild AI
headline: AI that understands construction blueprints
description: Bild AI reads construction blueprints and extracts material and cost data for builders. Our software automates the $50B/year spent on manual blueprint processing and material cost estimation.
tags: industry:computer-vision; industry:construction; industry:b2b; industry:architecture; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Roop Pal, Co-Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Bild AI. Graduated Columbia University with BS in CS at 19. Software engineer at Google and Waymo focused on CV/ML modeling. Rated top 6% across all Google engineers. Bootstrapped logistics SaaS startup to acquisition.

founders.name: Puneet Sukhija, Co-Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Bild AI. Built first house at 16. Built hundreds of houses over 7 years before getting acquired at 23. Dropped out of CS at University of British Columbia.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Bild AI**

**Website**: [bilds.ai](https://www.bilds.ai)

**Founded**: 2024  
**Location**: San Francisco  
**Team Size**: 2 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch**: W25  
**Group Partner**: Gustaf Alstromer  

**Mission**: Bild AI aims to revolutionize the construction industry by developing AI that can intelligently interpret construction blueprints.

---

**What's the Problem?**  
The construction industry wastes a staggering $50 billion annually on manual blueprint processing and material cost estimation. This outdated method is not only time-consuming but also prone to inaccuracies.  

**Enter Bild AI.**  
Bild AI has designed software that automatically reads construction blueprints and extracts crucial material and cost data. This means contractors can speed up their processes, reduce labor costs, and focus on building rather than paperwork.

---

**Key Features**:

1. **Estimation**: Bild AI can swiftly analyze plans and produce detailed cost breakdowns, empowering builders to provide accurate estimates and secure more contracts.

2. **Permitting**: The tool identifies code compliance issues before the blueprint submission, significantly improving the chances of approval without the frustrating back-and-forth that typically bogs down projects.

3. **Accuracy**: Bild AI ensures that blueprints are free of errors and inconsistencies, flagging discrepancies for review. The AI boasts a model accuracy rate of 95% and can save an average of six months in project timelines.

---

**Current Focus**:  
The company is relentlessly working on enhancing its blueprint reading capabilities and improving how construction professionals interact with this crucial data. They prioritize fast responses to user submissions, ensuring builders get the information they need efficiently.

---

**Why Does This Matter?**  
Construction is a multi-trillion dollar industry. By automating the blueprint reading process, Bild AI not only streamlines operations but also allows construction professionals to focus on creating rather than calculating. This innovative approach could set new industry standards and redefine how projects are managed.

In a nutshell, Bild AI is a bold leap towards a future where builders spend less time on tedious tasks and more time innovating—just the kind of disruption that’s needed in construction. If you’re in the industry, it might be worth checking out how this AI could save you from late nights poring over plans.

**Contact**: [contact@bilds.ai](mailto:contact@bilds.ai) 

If you want to dive deeper into understanding blueprints with ease, give their demo a shot!
